abstract: San Francisco Dist Atty George Gascon will expand investigation into city's police and sheriff's departments in order to determine whether agencies have deep-seated culture of systemic bias; decision follows unrest concerning police brutality nationwide and outrage in San Francisco over reports of racist, homophobic and violent behavior by city's police.
lead_paragraph: The case began when racist and homophobic text messages between 14 officers were found and will be broadened to determine if systemic bias exists within the force.

headline.main: Inquiry to Examine Racial Bias in the San Francisco Police
headline.print_headline: Inquiry to Examine the Extent of Racial Bias in the San Francisco Police
